channel.title: Paul-Graham on Adam Gordon Bell
channel.description: Recent content in Paul-Graham on Adam Gordon Bell

item.title: Incrementing
item.description: In an old essay, Paul Graham, talks about how some languages are more succinct and therefore they are more powerful. In fact, some programming languages can say things that you can’t easily say in others. Maybe you can’t say them at all. Its a good essay overall, you should read it.
